comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: The Koreshan Unity owned substantial property on Mound Key in the early 1900s. They used the island primarily for farming. This map of Mound Key shows Koreshan property holdings in 1911: floridamemory.com/exhibits/koreshan/documents.php?doc=3-4....
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: A fascinating group, not least of all for their heterodox scientific views.
